pages.text: Entheators ascending under the $(ml:miskatonicmysteries:goo/hastur)King of Carcosa$() may be granted several $(marked)blessings$() during their journey. Unlike most other blessings, these do not have an exact impact on the body, but they may be noticeable nonetheless.

pages.title: Magic Boost
pages.text: This rather universal blessing increases magic capability. The available pool of power during $(ml:spells/spells)spell creation$() is additionally increased, new mediums are unlocked and intensity occasionally heightened.

pages.title: Charming Personality
pages.text: When blessed with $(marked)Charming Personality$(), $(marked)Villagers$() won't think bad of you, ever. Additionally, social interaction energizes you.

pages.title: Royal Entourage
pages.text: This blessing will force nearby $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Serfs$() to aid you in slaughter, or to protect you. It also grants access to the $(marked)group$() spell medium.
